pageProduct.name: The Natural Confectionery Co. Squirms 180g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

The Natural Confectionery Co. Sour Squirm. Deliciously sour and fruity, so get a wriggle on!

What are you waiting for? The Natural Confectionery Co. Sour Squirms have a sour coating and fruity flavoured jellies, the perfect match. So, get a wriggle on to try these! Aussie Made and packed full of deliciousness, with no artificial colours, no artificial flavours, no GMOs and no artificial sweeteners.

Our Yummy Sour Fruit Flavours: Tangy Lime, Delectable Smooth Banana, Juicy Orange, Ripe Raspberry, Wild Blackcurrant

Contains Wheat.

Product Claims: No artificial sweeteners, colours or flavours, no GMO, no high fructose corn syrup

Size: 180g

Flavour: Wild blackcurrant, juicy orange, delectable smooth banana, ripe raspberry, tangy lime.

Serving Size: 25g (aprrox. 4 squirms)

Servings Per Pack: 7.2

Ingredients

Cane Sugar, Glucose Syrup (From Wheat And Corn), Thickener (Acid Modified Wheat Starch), Water, Food Acids (Citric, Fumaric, Tartaric), Gelatine, Fruit Juice Concentrate, Natural Flavours, Natural Food Colours (Anthocyanins, Grape Skin Extract, Black Carrot, Spirulina, Turmeric, Paprika Oleoresin).

Contains: Wheat.

Allergen Contains: Wheat

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours

Directions

Please store in cool, dry conditions.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Wrap. Return to store. arl.org.au | Red Cycle. In Australia, this packaging is recyclable through the REDcycle Program. www.redcycle.net.au

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
